articles.author: piyush
articles.title: Gaia telescope discovers two ancient streams of stars Shiva & Shakti - Adda247
articles.description: The European Space Agency’s Gaia space telescope has made a groundbreaking discovery, uncovering two ancient streams of stars named Shiva and Shakti. Led by Khyati Malhan of the Max Planck Institute for Astronomy (MPIA) in Germany, this revelation significant…
articles.content: Objectives and Contributions: In addition to mapping the Milky Way, Gaia’s data are utilized to study various astronomical phenomena, including star clusters, galaxies, and exoplanets, advancing our … [+40 chars]
